Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities

Name: Percentage of variants in which Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appears at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that are followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed within 7 days
Metric: the average of the function base < 7 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 compared to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 events that precede a reviewer response (either SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appears but SW-Reviewer Agreed never occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept versus those leading to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occur in cases with more than three reviewer assignment attempts (i.e., repeated SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: the average of the function base > 3 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that are immediately followed by another reminder (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2) without an intervening reviewer response
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Ratio of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to total reviewer-related activities (including SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in cases that include SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late' occurs

Name: Number of variants where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appears more than once
Metric: the sum of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that directly precede a change in editor (e.g., Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 relative to the total number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is issued but no reviewer ever agrees (i.e., absence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the trace)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occur in the context of major revision cycles (after SWâ€“Major Revision due in X weeks)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences per month to identify temporal patterns in reviewer follow-up
